name: Dodgepeople VR
description:
In a world where dodgeballs are people and people are dodgeballs, you need to pass middle school gym class.

Whitney Fahnbulleh - Programming; game design

Liza Knipscher - VR development; 3D modeling; animation; bad melodica cover of "It's Raining Men"

Aron Linde - Programming; homemade baked goods

Naszir Merritt - Programming; environment development; 3D asset painting

Rik Oclon - Rigging; 3D and 2D asset creation; voice acting; sound design

Christian, Colby, Joey, and Perry - Voice acting; QA; shenanigans
